resources.string: Click on + to add a WorkSpace account.
For automatic background synchronisation of your contacts and calendars, it is necessary to disable the Android \"Battery optimisation\" option for Infomaniak Sync.

Infomaniak Sync enables you to sync the contacts and calendars in WorkSpace, Infomaniak\'s webmail service.
This application is a fork of the OpenSource DAVx⁵ solution.
Synchronise your contacts and Workspace calendars on your device
View your contacts and calendars from your Android devices wherever you are.

Remove permissions if app isn’t used
If this option is enabled, permissions will be deleted after a while and synchronisation will no longer work.
Allow the application to run in the background

Your device is probably blocking synchronisation in the background despite the above option being enabled. Please follow this guide to change your synchronisation in the background settings. Otherwise, you may need to manually synchronise your data from the application.
